name: Kiddology \u2014 connecting families together
blurb: Save your children from mindless gameplay! Read stories, play games, and learn as a family through real-time video.

rewards.reward: THANK YOU \u2014 KIDDOLOGY wouldn\u2019t be possible without your generous contributions, and we want to acknowledge them. Someone from the KIDDOOGY team will reach out with a personal thank you.

VIP ACCESS \u2014 You can get your hands on this next generation kids app (iOS) in March BEFORE IT HITS THE MARKET!!! -- This beautifully illustrated, simple reading app comes with 4 gorgeous stories, 1 game, and loads of family friendly entertainment!!!

CHEERS TO YOU \u2014 With all our love we'll keep you updated on the project always keeping you up to speed, as well on our website we will place a personal thank you to you. And get a sticker sheet with Kiddology\u2019s main character Kiyoshi. These stickers are removable, water-resistant, dishwasher & microwave safe \u2013 perfect for kids!

FAN PACK \u2014 A postcard sized print of Kiyoshi and his friends from a scene in one of our books delivered to you personally. Illustrated and signed by our fantastic team of artists. Choose from a selection of scenes (see "Perks We Are Offering" section for details).
BUNDLE PACK \u2014 We combine the Cheers To You Special with a one-of-a-kind Kiddology pencil case and a mystery postcard illustration signed by our artists.
HUGGABLE \u2014 Just one adorable oh so lovable soft toy of our main character Kiyoshi of your very own.

SNACKS TOGETHER \u2014 Never have lunch alone, because you can have your own Kiddology lunch box with Kiyoshi there to greet you on the front. Measuring 7.5" x 6" x 3" you'll fit milk, crackers, sandwiches, and so much more in our Kiddology lunchbox.

TRENDSETTERS \u2014 Be the first to own a pack of Kiddology swag that includes: A sticker pack, A demo code for our in-app purchases, and a children's t-shirt or onesie with our Kiddology character Kiyoshi in a style of your choice. See "Perks We Are Offering" section for details.

SUPER FRIENDS \u2014 You get so much you'll need a friend to carry it all. A Kiddology sticker pack, a red pencil case with pencils, eraser and ruler, plus a choice between children\u2019s sized t-shirt or onesie or t-shirt that your child can color on, a full set of postcard sized prints signed by our artists, AND a promo code for our in-app purchases.

HOLIDAY SPECIAL \u2014 Make this Christmas a Kiddology Christmas with a Kiddology sticker pack, a demo code for our in app purchases, a full set of postcard sized prints from our artists, plus a 10 pack of Winter Holidays themed cards with Kiddology's main character Kiyoshi and friends.

OVER THE MOON \u2014 Kiddology will give early adopters an early peek into our real-time video platform in beta before anyone gets their hands on it. As well a pack of swag that includes a sticker page, a children's sized t-shirt or onesie or t-shirt that your child can color on, a demo code for our in-app purchases, a full set of postcard sized prints signed by our artists, AND your very own Kiddology lunch box.

EXTRA LOVE \u2014 We've put it all together in this package you get a Kiddology sticker pack, pencil case children sized t-shirt or onesie or a t-shirt your child can color on, a demo code for in-app purchases, your very own lunch box, early access to our real-time video platform before anyone else, PLUS a soft toy of Kiyoshi

PHOTOS LAST FOREVER \u2014 Bring one child to our studios for a professional studio shoot (located in Toronto, travel and accommodations not included) OR a framed caricature illustration (8.5 x 11) of 1 child with Kiddology's character Kiyoshi in a custom scene (email us 3 photos for reference and we'll do the rest). Also we'll send you a sticker pack, your choice between a children's sized t-shirt or onesie or children's t-shirt for your child to color on, a promo code for in-app purchases, plus early access to the Kiddology real-time video platform in beta before anyone else.

BIG TIMERS \u2014 Have a dinner with Kiddology founders during late January in Toronto (travel and accomodations are not included), discuss education, art, app development, gaming, cinematography, animations and the future of the  co-play for families interaction space. Also, get a promo code to our in-app purchases plus early access to our real-time video platform. We'll even throw in a handful of swag from the Photos Last Forever package.

LETS BE PARTNERS \u2014 We'll start a dialogue on how we can work together. You will receive exclusive updates for partners and we will consult with you on our development roadmap and our next features. You'll be invited to an individual workshop meeting with the founders in Toronto (travel and accommodations not included), to work on the future improvements for Kiddology and the ways the app integrates with co-play and real-time video. And of course, you will get a pack of swag that was mentioned in the Over The Moon special.
